description: The prefix semi- (from Latin) used as a noun.

entries.meaning: (UK, Ireland, Australia, Canada, informal) A semi-detached house.
examples: I′m selling two side-by-side semis that are currently under construction, a waterfront apartment and a house in Rose Bay.

entries.meaning: (Australia, Canada, New Zealand, US) A semi-trailer; a tractor-trailer; an eighteen-wheeler; an artic.
examples: All night we couldn′t hear each other speak because of the sound of semis changing gear to get over the hill.

entries.meaning: (slang) A partial erection of the penis.
examples: The twink got a semi just from that look.
